00024 // Core
00025 const bool Server::LoadCommands()
00026 {
00027     UFLAGS_DE( flags );
00028     timeval start, finish;
00029     Command* cmd = NULL;
00030     multimap<bool,string> files;
00031     MITER( multimap, bool,string, mi );
00032 
00033     start = Utils::CurrentTime();
00034     LOGSTR( 0, "Loading commands..." );
00035 
00036     // Populate the multimape with a recursive listing of the commands folder
00037     Utils::ListDirectory( CFG_DAT_DIR_COMMAND, true, files, m_dir_close, m_dir_open );
00038 
00039     if ( files.empty() )
00040     {
00041         LOGSTR( flags, "Server::LoadCommands()->Utils::ListDirectory()-> CFG_DAT_DIR_COMMAND returned NULL" );
00042         return false;
00043     }
00044 
00045     for ( mi = files.begin(); mi != files.end(); mi++ )
00046     {
00047         if ( mi->first == UTILS_IS_FILE )
00048         {
00049             cmd = new Command();
00050             if ( !cmd->Load( mi->second ) )
00051             {
00052                 LOGFMT( flags, "Server::LoadCommands()->Command::Load()-> command %s returned false", CSTR( mi->second ) );
00053                 delete cmd;
00054             }
00055         }
00056     }
00057 
00058     finish = Utils::CurrentTime();
00059     LOGFMT( 0, "Loaded %lu commands in %lums.", command_list.size(), Utils::DiffTime( start, finish, UTILS_TIME_MS ) );
00060 
00061     return true;
00062 }
00063 
00064 const bool Server::ProcessInput()
00065 {
00066     UFLAGS_DE( flags );
00067     ITER( list, SocketClient*, si );
00068     SocketClient* socket_client;
00069     sint_t client_desc = 0;
00070 
00071     for ( si = socket_client_list.begin(); si != socket_client_list.end(); si = m_socket_client_next )
00072     {
00073         socket_client = *si;
00074         m_socket_client_next = ++si;
00075 
00076         if ( ( client_desc = socket_client->gDescriptor() ) < 1 )
00077         {
00078             LOGFMT( flags, "Server::ProcessInput()->SocketClient::gDescriptor()-> returned invalid descriptor: %ld", client_desc );
00079             socket_client->Delete();
00080             continue;
00081         }
00082 
00083         if ( !socket_client->ProcessCommand() )
00084         {
00085             LOGFMT( flags, "Server::ProcessInput()->SocketClient::ProcessCommand()-> descriptor %ld returned false", client_desc );
00086             socket_client->Delete();
00087             continue;
00088         }
00089     }
00090 
00091     return true;
00092 }
00093 
00094 const void Server::Shutdown( const sint_t& status )
00095 {
00096     bool was_running = !m_shutdown;
00097     MITER( multimap, const char,Command*, mi );
00098     MITER( multimap, const char,Command*, mi_next );
00099     MITER( map, uint_t,string, ti );
00100     MITER( map, uint_t,string, ti_next );
00101     m_shutdown = true;
00102 
00103     // Cleanup commands
00104     for ( mi = command_list.begin(); mi != command_list.end(); )
00105     {
00106         mi_next = mi++;
00107         mi_next->second->Unload();
00108         command_list.erase( mi_next );
00109     }
00110 
00111     // Cleanup threads
00112     for ( ti = thread_list.begin(); ti != thread_list.end(); )
00113     {
00114         ti_next = ti++;
00115         pthread_cancel( ti_next->first );
00116         thread_list.erase( ti_next );
00117     }
00118 
00119     // Only output if the server actually booted; otherwise it probably faulted while getting a port from main()
00120     if ( was_running )
00121     {
00122         if ( status == EXIT_SUCCESS )
00123             LOGSTR( 0, CFG_STR_EXIT_SUCCESS );
00124         else
00125             LOGSTR( 0, CFG_STR_EXIT_FAILURE );
00126     }
00127 
00128     ::exit( status );
00129 }
00130 
00131 const void Server::Startup()
00132 {
00133     UFLAGS_DE( flags );
00134     SocketServer* socket_server;
00135     sint_t descriptor = 0;
00136     m_shutdown = false;
00137 
00138     LOGFMT( 0, "%s started.", CFG_STR_VERSION );
00139     m_time_boot = Utils::CurrentTime();
00140 
00141     if ( ( descriptor = ::socket( AF_INET6, SOCK_STREAM, 0 ) ) < 0 )
00142     {
00143         LOGERRNO( flags, "Server::Startup()->socket()->" );
00144         Shutdown( EXIT_FAILURE );
00145     }
00146 
00147     socket_server = new SocketServer( this, descriptor );
00148     m_socket = socket_server;
00149 
00150     if ( !socket_server->Thread() )
00151     {
00152         LOGSTR( flags, "Server::Startup()->SocketServer::Thread()-> returned false" );
00153         Shutdown( EXIT_FAILURE );
00154     }
00155 
00156     // Bump ourselves to the root folder for file paths
00157     if ( ::chdir( ".." ) < 0 )
00158     {
00159         LOGERRNO( flags, "Server::Startup()->chdir()->" );
00160         Shutdown( EXIT_FAILURE );
00161     }
00162 
00163     if ( !LoadCommands() )
00164     {
00165         LOGSTR( flags, "Server::Startup()->Server::LoadCommands()-> returned false" );
00166         Shutdown( EXIT_FAILURE );
00167     }
00168 
00169     LOGFMT( 0, "%s is ready on port %lu.", CFG_STR_VERSION, m_port );
00170     LOGSTR( 0, "Last compiled on " __DATE__ " at " __TIME__ "." );
00171 
00172     return;
00173 }
00174 
00175 const void Server::Update()
00176 {
00177     UFLAGS_DE( flags );
00178 
00179     m_time_current = Utils::CurrentTime();
00180 
00181     if ( !ProcessInput() )
00182     {
00183         LOGSTR( flags, "Server::Update()->Server::ProcessInput()-> returned false" );
00184         Shutdown( EXIT_FAILURE );
00185     }
00186 
00187     // Sleep to control game pacing
00188     ::usleep( USLEEP_MAX / CFG_GAM_PULSE_RATE );
00189 
00190     return;
00191 }

00193 // Query
00194 const string Server::gHostname() const
00195 {
00196     UFLAGS_DE( flags );
00197     string output;
00198     char hostname[CFG_STR_MAX_BUFLEN] = {'\0'};
00199 
00200     if ( ::gethostname( hostname, CFG_STR_MAX_BUFLEN - 1 ) < 0 )
00201     {
00202         LOGERRNO( flags, "Server::gHostname()->gethostname()->" );
00203         output = "(unknown)";
00204 
00205         return output;
00206     }
00207 
00208     output = hostname;
00209 
00210     return output;
00211 }

00220 // Manipulate
00221 const bool Server::sPort( const uint_t& port )
00222 {
00223     UFLAGS_DE( flags );
00224 
00225     // No logger output; this should only be called pre-boot
00226     if ( port <= CFG_SOC_MIN_PORTNUM || port >= CFG_SOC_MAX_PORTNUM )
00227         return false;
00228 
00229     m_port = port;
00230 
00231     return true;
00232 }
00233 
00234 const bool Server::sSocketClose( const uint_t& amount )
00235 {
00236     UFLAGS_DE( flags );
00237 
00238     if ( amount < 1 || ( ( m_socket_close + amount ) >= uintmax_t ) )
00239     {
00240         LOGFMT( flags, "Server::sSocketClose()-> called with m_socket_close overflow: %lu + %lu", m_socket_close, amount );
00241         return false;
00242     }
00243 
00244     m_socket_close += amount;
00245 
00246     return true;
00247 }
00248 
00249 const bool Server::sSocketOpen( const uint_t& amount )
00250 {
00251     UFLAGS_DE( flags );
00252 
00253     if ( amount < 1 || ( ( m_socket_open + amount ) >= uintmax_t ) )
00254     {
00255         LOGFMT( flags, "Server::sSocketOpen()-> called with m_socket_open overflow: %lu + %lu", m_socket_open, amount );
00256         return false;
00257     }
00258 
00259     m_socket_open += amount;
00260 
00261     return true;
00262 }
00263 
00264 Server::Server()
00265 {
00266     m_dir_close = 0;
00267     m_dir_open = 0;
00268     m_port = 0;
00269     m_shutdown = true;
00270     m_socket = 0;
00271     m_socket_client_next = socket_client_list.begin();
00272     m_socket_close = 0;
00273     m_socket_open = 0;
00274     m_time_boot = timeval();
00275     m_time_current = timeval();
00276 
00277     return;
00278 }
